__e: Once i loved a man who did not love me, and i could not bear it, for the world was an empty place without him.
And I wouldn't have wasted a year of my life with somebody who... who didn't love me.
So you basically are saying you don't think he loved me enough to murder me.
Then he came to me one day and told me he didn't love me anymore.
He loved me more than anything in the world, just like your father loves you.
He never told me it was over, or that he didn't love me anymore.
And he told me last night that he loves me, and that he wanted to come on this trip with me and my family.
He told me that he loved me and that he thought I was a good boy, said he was sorry for all the times he was a dick.
- No, he just... oh, he said he just loved me... and that he just wanted me to be safe.

He said that he loved me very much And that whatever happened that would never, ever change
I don't think David liked me very much.
Said that he liked me, and then i told him that i liked him back, And then he kissed me. And then he said that he didn't have a girlfriend.

i believe he also loved me but he didn't have the time to tell me that.
